alert.note: Alert for Chase; Hayes (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 8:25PM CDT until May 05 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Chase County in southwestern Nebraska... Central Hayes County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 915 PM CDT/815 PM MDT/. * At 824 PM CDT/724 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles northwest of Hayes Center, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hayes Center and Hayes Center State Wildlife Management Area. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
